snippet: The state on Wednesday announced a second fine against the private vendor that took over the job of feeding inmates last year as the company defended its operations before a prisons oversight committee....

headline.print_headline: Ohio: 2nd Fine Levied Against Prison Food Vendor
headline.main: Ohio: 2nd Fine Levied Against Prison Food Vendor

lead_paragraph: The state on Wednesday announced a second fine against the private vendor that took over the job of feeding inmates last year as the company defended its operations before a prisons oversight committee.
